sentences.sContent: Most of the sequences are aperiodic with recurrence intervals varying from a few minutes to hundreds of days.
sentences.sContent_eng: Most of the sequences are aperiodic with recurrence intervals varying from a few minutes to hundreds of days.
sentences.sCn: 大部分相似地震的活动表现为非周期性，重复间隔从数分钟到数百天不等。

sentences.sContent: And it is further proved that the technique is effective and practical by means of the examples of the extraction of periodic and aperiodic signals.
sentences.sContent_eng: And it is further proved that the technique is effective and practical by means of the examples of the extraction of periodic and aperiodic signals.
sentences.sCn: 运用周期和非周期弱信号的检测实例，进一步证明了该方法的有效性和实用性。

synos.tran: 不定期的；[数]非周期性的

remMethod.val: a(不) + period(周期) + ic → 不定期的， 非周期性的

trans.tranOther: not periodic; not occurring at regular intervals
